Tables

Tables

Tables can be used to organize and display data
Table Caption
Table Header Table Header Table Header
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Footer Table Footer Table Footer 
<table>
    <caption>Table Caption</caption>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
    <tfoot>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
        </tr>
    </tfoot>
</table>

Styles

Narrow
Table Caption
Table Header Table Header Table Header
Table Row Table Row Table Row

Table Footer Table Footer Table Footer

    <caption>Table Caption</caption>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>

Combination
Use any mix of style classes to create the perfect table
Table Caption
Table Header Table Header Table Header
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Footer Table Footer Table Footer 
<table class="narrow striped bordered">
    <caption>Table Caption</caption>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
    <tfoot>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
        </tr>
    </tfoot>
</table>

Colors

Hover Color
Change the row hover color to enhance readability using boba's palette
Table Caption
Table Header Table Header Table Header
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Footer Table Footer Table Footer 
<table class="narrow green hover-only">
    <caption>Table Caption</caption>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
            <td>Table Row</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
    <tfoot>
        <tr>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
            <td>Table Footer</td>
        </tr>
    </tfoot>
</table>
Row Color
Change the striped row color to increase consistency using boba's palette
Table Caption
Table Header Table Header Table Header
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Row Table Row Table Row
Table Footer Table Footer Table Footer 
<table class="striped orange">
    <caption>Table Caption</caption>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
            <th>Table Header</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
